alert.note: Alert for Black Hawk (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 28 at 4:28AM CST until March 01 at 12:00AM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Iowa... Black Hawk Creek at Hudson affecting Black Hawk County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Hawk Creek at Hudson. * WHEN...From this evening to just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Water affects Watters Road. Some residential evacuations may be needed. Ridgeway Avenue at US 63 in Waterloo is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:45 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 11.9 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.0 feet this evening. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
